name: Infection Control Tactics
description: Mastering strategies to prevent and control the spread of infectious diseases and biological threats.

cards.title: Proper Use of Personal Protective Equipment (PPE)
cards.description: Ensuring effective protection against biological hazards through correct use of PPE.
cards.bulletpoints: Glove layering, N95 vs. P100 masks, full-body suit protocols
cards.summaryText: Layer gloves, seal suits, and match respirators to the threat so no pathogen slips past your PPE.

cards.title: Sterilization & Disinfection Techniques
cards.description: Methods for eliminating pathogens from surfaces, equipment, and environments.
cards.bulletpoints: UV sterilization, chemical disinfectants, autoclave usage
cards.summaryText: Cycle UV, chemical, and thermal sterilization so every surface and tool stays pathogen-free.

cards.title: Barrier and Isolation Measures
cards.description: Strategies for minimizing direct and indirect pathogen transmission.
cards.bulletpoints: Negative pressure rooms, contact isolation, airlock procedures
cards.summaryText: Lock down zones with negative pressure, contact barriers, and tight airlock discipline to shut down transmission routes.
